events.message: I recently received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's issue has been classified under 'Refund' due to their request for money back following an incorrect shipment.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah Mitchell to handle the refund process and assist the customer accordingly.
Hello, this is Sarah from Customer Support. I understand you received the wrong item and Iâ€™m here to help you get this resolved quickly.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you actually received so I can verify the issue for the refund?
Here is my order number 123456789 and I have attached a photo showing the item I got is not what I ordered. Hoping for a quick refund.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund immediately and send you a prepaid label to return the incorrect item.
I appreciate your quick response and the offer to refund my purchase. The prepaid label will be very helpful for the return.
The refund has been processed and the return label has been emailed to you. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and the return process was smooth. We're here if you have any other questions.
Since the refund is complete and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting Customer Support.
We have sent a satisfaction survey regarding your recent refund experience. We value your feedback to improve our services.
